title: Journalist Anis Alamgir arrested in anti-terrorism case
body: Journalist Anis Alamgir, who was detained from Dhaka's Dhanmondi last night, has been arrested in a case filed under the Anti-Terrorism Act. Arian Ahmed, a central organiser of the July Revolutionary Alliance, filed the complaint with Uttara West Police Station earlier today against four individuals: Anis, actress Meher Afroz Shaon, Maria Kispotta, and Imtu Ratish. Shafikul Alam, additional commissioner of Dhaka Metropolitan Police (DMP), confirmed the development. Anis was picked up from a gym in Dhanmondi yesterday evening and taken to the DB office on Minto Road around 7:30pm, according to sources. Anis has worked at several media outlets, including print and electronic media. In recent times, he has drawn attention for his active presence on television talk shows.
